title: Bug 14047 - StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is getting redrawn N times.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the StyledText in word wrap mode.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText.
3. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times.
